articles.title: GMB's Susanna Reid in fiery row as Edwina Currie tells her ‘you’re not Piers Morgan’ - Mirror Online
articles.description: Good Morning Britain's Susanna Reid was told "you're not Piers Morgan" as she interrupted Edwina Currie in a debate over the government's handling of the pandemic
articles.content:
Good Morning Britain 's Susanna Reid got into a fiery clash with former Conservative MP Edwina Currie on Wednesday's show in a debate over the government's handling of the pandemic.
